title: Treshkilling
author: Treshkilling
content: If you love Play-to-earn games, NFTs and crypto in general, then you might just want to check out Mallconomy!Featuring elements of all of the above, Mallconomy is the latest game in the GameFi space. Having just launched today, Mallconomy is bound for greatness. Whilst I can't give away all the details, there are a number of high profile advisors on board, advisors who have recently secured tens of millions in funding for other crypto projects. So Mallconomy is certainly not just another run of the mill Metaverse game>So how does it work?Set in the Mallverse, gamers will be able to rent, buy or lease a store within the mall, allowing them to operate and earn real profits. Budding entrepreneurs will be able to sell digital items and, in the future, even real items, as they build their e-commerce brand.Mallconomy will empower gamers with 3 unique roles within the Mallverse: proprietors, workers and customers.Proprietors will buy or rent stores in the mall, where they can own and trade anything they earn in the gamified environment.Workers will be able to work for proprietors, promoting their business or helping to scale the business.Customers will be able to create and trade NFTs, win $WOOT tokens in the in-mall arcade, find loot boxes, or visit the in-mall cinema.But there is so much more! Mallconomy will feature a unique DeFi solution, offering collateralized lending options, to allow users to buy their own stores, staking of the native token (more on that later) and farming options, offering attractive interest rates for token pooling. MallBank will become a unique, turn-key Defi lending solution, built by the team behind multi-award winning London Fintechs, and previously having scaled Defi projects from scratch to tens of thousands in weeks!Genesis NFT collection, coming soon!Mallconomy's genesis NFT collection, MallCards, is set to launch in the early part of this quarter. Featuring Silver, Gold and Platinum editions, Mallcards will be benefit packed, offering holder's rewards such as automatic whitelisting for future events, early access to our token generation event, airdrops for staking, loot box drops and exclusive access to premium areas within our Mall, which will feature bargain items and customisations for your avatar, amongst other things!
